title: Editor settings
intro: Here you can customize various editor settings according to your preferences, settings are automatically saved as they are updated.
settings_file_info: Your settings file is located at
autoindent_help: Automatically indent text on new lines.
wordwrap_help: Automatically break lines to fit the width of the editor.
scrollsync_help: Enable scroll sync between the editor and the preview.
systemtheme_help: Let your system theme override your stored settings.
